effect_entries.effect:
Whenever a dark-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage.

The move is not negated in any way.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.

effect_entries.effect: Whenever this Pokémon flinches, its Speed rises one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.
